Let me guess. I'm a famous outlaw, yeah? Men fear me? Ladies love me?
translation.de: Ich rate: Ein berühmter Gesetzloser. Männer fürchten mich, Frauen lieben mich.

translation.en: You're a doorknob salesman.
What'd you call me?
You're my dad's brother, Philip.
You and my dad came to Slumberland every night when you were kids.
translation.de: Ihr wart als Kinder jeden Abend im Schlummerland.

translation.en: And then, he left.
Oh, wow.
After that, Philip stopped dreaming, and you couldn't wake up.
translation.de: Philip hörte auf zu träumen, und du konntest nicht aufwachen.

translation.en: I remember.
But when you get your Pearl, you can wake up, and you can be one person again.
translation.de: Aber mit einer Perle kannst du aufwachen und wieder eine einzelne Person sein.

translation.en: This is a buzzkill.
I'm gonna get us both killed for that guy?
translation.de: Für den Typen gefährde ich unser Leben?

translation.en: We're so close, and he needs you.
translation.de: Wir sind so nah dran, und er braucht dich.

translation.en: Well, I don't need him, all right? I got everything that I want right here.
translation.de: Ich brauche ihn nicht, ok? Ich habe hier, was ich will.

translation.en: Wine, women, waffles. The three dubs.
translation.de: Wein, Weiber, Waffeln. Die drei Ws.

translation.en: Not necessarily in that order.
I'm not a knob seller. I'm a flippin' outlaw!
translation.de: Ich bin kein Knaufverkäufer, ich bin ein Gesetzloser!

translation.en: But I thought that when we get our Pearls, I could be with my dad at night, and during the day, I could be with you.
translation.de: Ich dachte, mit den Perlen kann ich nachts bei Dad sein und am Tag bei dir.

translation.en: You could be like my part-time dad.
I am nobody's dad, kid.
So you're just giving up?
I'll tell you what I'm gonna do.
translation.de: Ich sag dir, was ich mache.

translation.en: I'm gonna go find a dream with a bar in it, and then I'm gonna drink until I forget who I am again.
translation.de: Ich suche mir einen Traum mit einer Bar und trinke, bis ich alles vergesse.

translation.en: Then I'm gonna go find someone's ex. 'Cause there's a lot of them around here.
translation.de: Dann suche ich irgendeine Exfreundin. Davon gibt's hier viele.

translation.en: But I… I did the Double-Knock.
So did I, kid.
The night your dad left, I begged him to stay.
translation.de: In jener Nacht, als dein Vater ging, bat ich ihn, zu bleiben.

translation.en: I'll go without you.
I'll see my dad again, and I don't care if I never wake up.
translation.de: Ich sehe Dad wieder, und es ist mir egal, ob ich nie aufwache.

translation.en: Hey, no. You can't.
It's too dangerous to go in alone.
You can't tell me what to do… 'cause you're not my dad.
translation.de: Du kannst mir nichts verbieten. Du bist nicht mein Dad.

translation.en: I never shoulda brought you.
translation.de: Ich hätte dich nicht mitnehmen sollen.

translation.en: Just go back to where you belong. Otherwise, you're gonna end up like me.
translation.de: Geh dahin zurück, wo du hingehörst. Sonst endest du wie ich.

translation.en: [in a woman's voice] Nemo. Wake up.
Wake up!
-[Nemo gasps, shudders] -[Arya] Nemo?
Get your things.
We're calling your uncle.
[Arya] It's not just the lying, Nemo.
translation.de: Es geht nicht nur ums Lügen, Nemo. Sondern, dass du dich davonschleichst.

translation.en: It's sneaking off like that. No one knew where you were.
translation.de: Es geht nicht nur ums Lügen, Nemo. Sondern, dass du dich davonschleichst. Niemand wusste, wo du bist. Du hättest in großer Gefahr sein können.

translation.en: For all we knew, you could've been in terrible danger.
translation.de: Niemand wusste, wo du bist. Du hättest in großer Gefahr sein können.

translation.en: Yeah.
Why would you do that? You wouldn't understand.
translation.de: -Warum tust du so was? -Würden Sie nie verstehen.

translation.en: Why don't you try me?
Okay.
Well, m-- Maybe it would help if, uh… if you went first.
Would you like to tell Nemo how you're feeling?
translation.de: Möchten Sie Nemo sagen, wie Sie sich fühlen?

translation.en: I don't know what you want me to say. I don't do feelings.
translation.de: Was soll ich sagen? Ich bin nicht sehr emotional.

translation.en: Everyone does feelings, whether you like it or not.
translation.de: Das ist jeder. Ob Sie es mögen oder nicht.

translation.en: You two are in the same boat. You just don't realize it.
translation.de: Sie sitzen im selben Boot, ohne es zu merken.

translation.en: Guys, come on. You're both struggling with powerful emotions,
translation.de: Ihr habt beide mit starken Emotionen zu kämpfen.

translation.en: and you just… you just need to deal with them.
Do we, though?
Um, everybody always says that, but… I'm not convinced.
translation.de: Das sagen immer alle, aber ich bin davon nicht überzeugt.

translation.en: I-- I-- I've [scoffs] I've never dealt with my feelings, and I'm fine.
translation.de: Ich setzte mich nie damit auseinander, und mir geht's gut.

translation.en: I was fine. Should've just had them send me to foster care.
translation.de: -Mir ging es gut. -Eine Pflegefamilie wäre besser gewesen.

translation.en: You'd probably be better off.
At least foster parents know how to be parents.
Nemo, we should probably talk.
I don't wanna talk. You wanna get rid of me, so get rid of me.
translation.de: Ich will nicht reden. Du willst mich loswerden, also mach's.

translation.en: [sighs] I'm not trying to get rid of you, Nemo. I'm… I'm trying to help you.
translation.de: Ich will dich nicht loswerden, Nemo. Ich will dir helfen.

translation.en: You're as bad as he is.
translation.de: Du bist so schlimm wie er.

translation.en: What? Who?
You only care about yourself.
Are you kidding? I have done nothing but take care of you.
translation.de: Machst du Witze? Ich habe mich nur um dich gekümmert.

translation.en: I-- I-- I cook. I-- I entertain.
I try.
And what do I get in return? You just lie to my face.
translation.de: Und was kriege ich dafür? Du belügst mich.

translation.en: I think we're bonding, and I let you borrow my precious lockpicks so--
translation.de: Ich dachte, wir nähern uns an. Ich borge dir meine kostbaren Dietriche…

translation.en: Nobody cares about door stuff, okay? Why do you think you have no friends?
translation.de: Keinen interessieren Türen, ok? Wieso hast du wohl keine Freunde?

translation.en: Why do you think you live alone?
You should go to your room!
Where do you think I'm going? You're not my dad!
translation.de: Was denkst du denn, wo ich hingehe? Du bist nicht mein Dad.

translation.en: Hey, I'm not trying to be!
translation.de: Das will ich auch gar nicht sein!

translation.en: I live alone because I like it that way!
translation.de: Ich lebe allein, weil ich es so mag!

translation.en: I didn't ask for any of this to happen. I didn't ask you to come live here!
translation.de: Ich hab nie drum gebeten. Ich wollte nicht, dass du kommst.

translation.en: But I'm glad you did.
Pig, we're goin' home.
[Philip] Nemo?
No, I don't know. I don't--
Carla, I don't know. I just woke up, and she wasn't here.
translation.de: Carla, ich weiß nicht. Ich bin aufgewacht, und sie war weg.

translation.en: Well, I have no idea where she would go.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, wo sie sein könnte.

translation.en: Right.
Pig!
-Oh, yeah. [laughs] -[air-raid sirens wailing]
[Flip] Oh! The End of the Line!
-It's party time! -[neon sign buzzing]
Yeah, baby! Oh!
Number one! Top of Slumberland, baby!
You see that?
Hope they catch the bastard.
[Flip] Oh, yeah. Guy seems like a real bad egg. You know? Pee-yew.
translation.de: Oh ja. Der Typ scheint echt übel zu sein. Und übelriechend.

translation.en: He took a little girl to the Sea of Nightmares,
translation.de: Er brachte ein Mädchen zum Meer der Albträume,

translation.en: and then he ditched her, and she went in alone.
translation.de: dann haute er ab und ließ sie allein.

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
Hey, you're…
A shiny pink diamond?
-Yeah. Pretty, isn't it? Hi-yah! -That's nice.
[Nemo, echoing] Come on, Pig. Grab one, and let's go.
translation.de: Komm, Schwein. Schnapp dir eine und dann weg.

translation.en: [exclaims] Yeah!
Flip?
[Nemo] Flip!
[Flip] I got ya. Oh!
Get in the cab!
You came back for me!
Yeah. Outlaw Code. Never leave your partner behind.
translation.de: Ja. Gesetzlosen-Kodex. Lass die Partnerin nie zurück.

translation.en: -Even if she is a pain in the… -Applesauce.
Applesauce! [laughs]
Oh! I got a Pearl.
Oh! Aces!
So long, suckers!
Oh, hey! Hey, guys!
-[Pig squeals] -[screaming] Nightmare!
We have to get to the lighthouse! Green said it's my safe place!
translation.de: Wir müssen zum Leuchtturm! Green sagt, da ist es sicher.

translation.en: I know!
Don't look down!
-Pull up! -I am!
-[Nemo screaming] -Oh my! Oh my!
-[grunting] -[Nemo whimpers] No! Drive the plane!
-Flip, come on. Flip! -[Pig oinks]
[Canadian] Aw, jeez. What a gong show.
Okay, one minute, you think you're going out for a rip… Oh. Hey, sorry, guy.
translation.de: Man denkt, man dreht nur 'ne Runde… Oh, hey. Tut mir leid.

translation.en: And the next thing you know, you're goin' for a dip.
There he is.
-[Canadian whimpering] -Get in here!
Come on. Hey, Emmett, you party?
translation.de: Steig ein. Hey, Emmett, Bock auf Party?

translation.en: I party.
Come here! Get in here!
[in Southern accent] Hey, Emmett, take a right.
Here we go.
-I can't. I can't. What's that? -Come here, buddy.
Hit it, Emmett!
[Flip] Yeah!
Help! Oh, my hair! My hair!
[in Spanish] I knew you'd return!
I smelled your musk.
Uh, sí, sí, sí. Pero no.
-[Canadian gasps] -[announcer on TV] Now, McRoy to center. There's O'Reilly… Great pass to Johnson, and a goal!
translation.de: McRoy zieht zur Mitte. Da ist O'Reilly. Toller Pass an Joseph… und ein Tor!

translation.en: -He scores! -Yes! Let's go! Let's go!
-[motor whirring] -[wind whipping] -[wistful piano music playing] -[thunder rumbling]
[sighs] We're gonna make it, kid.
Come on. I see the lighthouse.
Come on, kid. We're almost there. You can finally make your wish.
translation.de: Komm. Wir sind fast da. Endlich kannst du dir was wünschen.

translation.en: [gasps] What's wrong?
[weakly] Oh… I don't feel so good.
[Flip] Nemo!
[Carla] Hey, slow down! Slow down!
Pig.
[Flip] What's wrong?
[weakly] Something's not right.
I'm gonna get you home.
You'll be safe at home.
There!
There!
Wait, the Pearl. I dropped the Pearl. We have to go back.
translation.de: Halt! Die Perle. Ich ließ sie fallen. Wir müssen zurück.

translation.en: You get to the lighthouse. I'll get the Pearl, okay? Go.
translation.de: Ab zum Leuchtturm. Ich hole die Perle. Ok? Los!

translation.en: Wait. No, not without you!
-[Flip grunting] -[Nemo] Flip!
-[Flip yelling and grunting] -[Nemo] Flip!
[Flip groaning] Nemo!
[Flip, echoing] Nemo, go! Get to the lighthouse!
Say hi to your dad for me.
Flip? Wake up.
[Carla] Philip!
What are you doing?
[Carla] No! Get down! Philip! Philip!
[Carla] No!
Let's go home.
Well, this is gonna be a buttload of paperwork.
So Nemo, how do you feel? Different?
translation.de: Also, Nemo, wie fühlst du dich? Anders?

translation.en: Big journey, all by yourself.
I see you've found yourself a Pearl.
translation.de: Ach, du hast eine Perle gefunden.

translation.en: Guess it's not a myth after all.
translation.de: Es ist also doch kein Mythos.

translation.en: I didn't get my dad back.
You had to give up your dream.
I guess you found something more important.
translation.de: Ich glaube, du hast etwas Wichtigeres gefunden.

translation.en: Right, better get to work, then.
translation.de: Na gut, machen wir uns an die Arbeit.

translation.en: -[Pig snorting] -[Green] Oh, uh… [sighs]
You've got a good pig there.
Give it a squeeze for me.
-[Pig grunts] -[Green] Told you.
You have the dream you're meant to have.
translation.de: Du träumst, was du träumen sollst.

translation.en: We make sure of that.
What you do next…? Well, that's up to you.
translation.de: Was du als Nächstes tust, ist deine Entscheidung.

translation.en: Ugh! Seriously? Look at this mess!
translation.de: Im Ernst? Was für ein Chaos.

translation.en: Can I get a cleaning crew in here pronto? Come on!
translation.de: Kann bitte sofort eine Putzkolonne kommen? Gibt's doch nicht.

translation.en: [crying] I missed you so much.
I miss you.
Race you to the top?
Help!
-Nemo! She's not breathing. -[Carla] Okay.
We got her! We got her. It's okay. Okay.
translation.de: Wir kümmern uns! Schon gut. Ok.

translation.en: Did you ever figure it out? What the lighthouse is for?
translation.de: Hast du es je herausgefunden? Wozu der Leuchtturm da ist?

translation.en: -[Pig oinking] -It's not to keep ships safe.
No. If we wanted to do that, we'd never let 'em leave harbor, would we?
translation.de: Nein. Wenn das so wäre, würden wir sie nie losfahren lassen, oder?

translation.en: [Carla] Nothing. Okay. One, two, three, four, five, six.
translation.de: Nichts. Ok. Eins, zwei, drei, vier, fünf, sechs…

translation.en: -Come on, Nemo! -[Carla] Seven, eight, nine.
-[Philip] Breathe! -[Carla] Come on. Oh.
To guide you on your journey.
translation.de: Um dich auf deiner Reise zu führen.

translation.en: That's right.
So you can see things that the lighthouse keeper can only dream of.
translation.de: Damit du Dinge siehst, von denen ein Leuchtturmwärter nur träumen kann.

translation.en: I didn't teach you all those things so you could live on an island.
translation.de: Ich lehrte dich die Dinge nicht, damit du auf der Insel leben kannst.

translation.en: I did it so that you could know…
translation.de: Ich tat es, damit du weißt…

translation.en: you can do anything.
[Carla] Okay, come on, Nemo.
One, two, three…
I didn't think I could go on without you.
translation.de: Ich dachte, ich kann ohne dich nicht weiterleben.

translation.en: You traveled to the Sea of Nightmares and came back home safe again.
translation.de: Du bist zum Meer der Albträume gereist und kamst sicher wieder nach Hause.

translation.en: After that, I don't think the Waking World's gonna be too difficult.
translation.de: Nach so etwas ist die Wachwelt doch ein Klacks.

translation.en: But that's up to you.
Life is waiting for you, Nemo.
translation.de: Das Leben wartet auf dich, Nemo.

translation.en: It would be a shame to miss that.
translation.de: Es wäre schade, es zu verpassen.

translation.en: [crying] I have to go back.
That's my girl.
[takes a deep breath] And you never forget…
how very proud I am of you.
And keep an eye on that brother of mine.
translation.de: Und pass auf meinen Bruder auf.

translation.en: He seems normal, but he's not.
translation.de: Er wirkt normal, ist es aber nicht.

translation.en: Deep down, he's a wild man.
translation.de: Tief im Inneren ist er ungestüm.

translation.en: Bye, Dad.
[Carla] Okay, let's go!
Come on, get her over!
There we go! Good girl, Nemo! -[laughing] Good girl! -[Philip sobbing]
translation.de: Na also! Braves Mädchen, Nemo! Braves Mädchen!

translation.en: [Carla] Good girl.
You're okay. You're okay.
I got you. And I'm not gonna let go of you ever, okay?
translation.de: Ich passe auf dich auf. Und ich lasse dich nie wieder gehen, ok?

translation.en: [softly] Yeah. [mimics Flip] It's Flip.
And Philip. Philip and Flip.
Flilip? [high-pitched snicker]
-[Undeadheads groan] -[Nemo] Bye, Jamal. See you tomorrow.
You know, not a lot of people know this, but I'm actually a master pickpocket.
translation.de: Kaum jemand weiß das, aber ich bin eigentlich ein Taschendieb.

translation.en: Oh, come on. No, you're not. [chuckles]
-Oh my G-- -You have very smooth wrists.
[Arya] Wait. What? How did you…?
I'm gonna take you sailing.
Maybe next time you can come with us.
translation.de: Kommen Sie doch nächstes Mal mit.

translation.en: Yeah, I'd love to. [chuckles]
Aces.
Oh. Oh, wait. I need my watch back.
translation.de: Moment. Ich will meine Uhr zurück.

translation.en: [Philip and Arya laugh] Yeah.
No. No, seriously. Can I get my watch back?
translation.de: Im Ernst. Bekomme ich meine Uhr zurück?

translation.en: [quietly] Call me.
Oh, great. You're already dressed for bed.
translation.de: Oh, toll. Du bist schon bettfertig.

translation.en: [Nemo] Well, I don't like to be late.
So, what's the plan tonight?
translation.de: Und, wie sieht der Plan aus?

translation.en: I don't know. I think I might just wander and see what happens.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht. Ich glaube, ich will einfach mal sehen, was passiert.

translation.en: Sounds good.
-Night-night, kiddo. I love you. -I love you too.
